ideas.title: Tube Map Conversion Funnel
ideas.premise: A digital marketing manager presents a tube map drawn as a conversion funnel, complete with 'Mind the Gap' CTAs.
ideas.why_funny: London specific. Turns relatable tube frustration into corporate jargon.

ideas.title: Pigeon Algorithm Update
ideas.premise: A flock of London pigeons wearing tiny Google-branded harnesses dramatically alters their flight paths based on an algorithm update.
ideas.why_funny: Pigeons are a London icon, absurdity of applying algorithms to them.

ideas.title: SEO for the Crown Jewels
ideas.premise: A digital marketing manager is desperately trying to improve the SEO ranking of the Crown Jewels at the Tower of London.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of ancient history with modern marketing concerns.

ideas.title: Spray Gate Ad Campaign
ideas.premise: A BA digital marketing manager frantically pivots the company's ad campaign to promote the new 'insecticide-fresh' cabin air.
ideas.why_funny: Topical news event turned into a humorous marketing blunder.

ideas.title: Brexit Bounce Rate
ideas.premise: A digital marketing manager points to a graph showing an inexplicable spike in website bounce rate directly after the Brexit vote.
ideas.why_funny: Uses Brexit as a relatable, yet unexpected, plot device.
